name: Cosmos Loot
description:
Your task is to collect all kinds of space junk with the help of gravitational rays (they are on the sides of the ship). You can move the ship left-right with the slider at the bottom of the screen. 

For different garbage you will get different number of coins: for an asteroid - 1 coin, for a golden asteroid - 5 coins, for space garbage - 3 coins. The more coins an object gives, the higher its flight speed. 
If some asteroid or junk hits your ship - game over.

Collect as many space garbage as possible and help us to clean up the cosmos!
